group_1.textLeft: 縺ｫ繧ゅжｌ!!
縺雁燕ｑ溘ォ薙?!
[flashEffect:flashWhite2][surround:1302A01]And while you're flinching...!
隕九≠隕?ｽゅ?縺雰！

group_1.narration: This Witch was once a Magical Girl just like me.@They were someone who you could study with.@They enjoyed club activities and had a loving family.@And now I...

No, it still means something to defeat her.@Both Himuro-san and Miura-san said that by@defeating Witches, we can honor the@unblemished feelings of the Magical Girls who@have been working to save everyone after@wishing for a miracle.

group_1.textRight: Himuro-dono, let's take it from here!

group_1.textLeft: Understood.
Cleanse yourself too, Kurusu.@Your Soul Gem won't last long otherwise.

group_1.textRight: No, I flinched at the last second and couldn't@finish off the Witch.
If I had done something wrong, I could have@caused trouble for both of you...

group_1.textLeft: If anything, it would trouble us if Sasha-dono@were to become a Witch.
In fact, we would surely miss you.
Even if we come to terms with the idea of@fighting Witches,
the mysterious tension of being trapped in@something doesn't go away.

group_1.textRight: It feels surreal just knowing the truth about@Magical Girls...

group_1.textLeft: ...I remembered the cat I had at home.
I kept her inside the house, but one day,@she got out...
And ever since then, she's been looking longingly@out the window.
Perhaps, having seen the outside world, she@gained an awareness of her surroundings,
and may have been seeking salvation...
Don't you think it's the same for us?
Suddenly knowing the truth, suffering, seeking@freedom and salvation...

group_1.textRight: Learning that I would become a Witch made me@feel like I was caught off guard by something.
It reminded me of the rabbits that I shot@down myself...
Maybe it's because this realization of the truth
has made me aware of my own captivity,@trapped by the unknown...
How was it for you, Himuro-dono?

group_1.textLeft: Well, I felt as if the stars in the night sky were@closing in on me...
Stars floating in the night sky that had been looking@down on me as a human being until now
were imminent upon me as if to say,@"that is who you truly are."
At the same time, a feeling of emptiness spread@through my heart that no one would ever
understand us, who are outside the realm@of logic that ordinary people can understand.
Hardly anyone understood the disease I once@suffered from.
Therefore, I decided to keep the existence known@as Rabi Himuro to myself.
People are intolerant of things that they don't@understand.
I know that well...

group_1.textRight: We are the only ones who can understand this@eerie sense of control...

group_1.textLeft: Which means that we Magical Girls have no choice@but to face it alone, right...?
